job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Fast growing, stable company with tremendous growth seeking a remote Senior Data Scientist to assist the engineering and data science teams.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Data Scientist Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>We are looking for "hands-on" data scientists who worked on Consumer-Packaged Goods (CPG) or Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) industry with specific project experience in any of these 4 business areas: product recommendation engine: Cross-Sell/Up-Sell, Customer segmentation, and Assortment planning; pricing elasticity; trade promotion optimization; or supply chain logistics with distribution center</li><li>8+ years of IT experience and at least 4 years or more of work experience in data scientist discipline.</li><li>Deep knowledge of machine learning, statistics, optimization or related field.</li><li>Experience with R, Python, Matlab is required.</li><li>Experience building machine learning application in areas like time series forecasting, classification models, clustering models, multivariate regression models etc. </li><li>Experience in Microsoft Azure Stack in the Cloud with focus on Data Factory, Data Bricks, BLOBs, Data Lake Storage, ML Studio, Azure Analysis Services, Azure Data Warehouse, Power BI etc.</li><li>Experience working with large data sets and distributed computing tools a plus (Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Python, R, Gurobi, MySQL, etc.).</li><li>Excellent written and verbal communication skills along with strong desire to work in cross functional teams.</li><li>Consumer products experience in an online and/or retail/manufacturing environment is preferred.</li><li>Possess strong leadership skills and exhibit creative thinking to be able to come up with inventive solutions to solve business challenges.</li><li>Strong Technical leadership of advanced analytics teams and vendors.</li><li>Extensive experience collaborating with Enterprise Architects and infrastructure engineers to identify, design, and implement highly complex, end-to-end solutions</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Data Scientist Compensation and Benefits:</strong></p><ul><li>Competitive base salary plus equity potential with tremendous value and growth!</li><li>Comprehensive health insurance, dental insurance, and life insurance packages</li><li>Amazing company culture working with enthusiastic and driven team in a highly meritocratic environment</li><li>Join a leadership team with decades of experience in the artificial intelligence world with a conservative approach to regulation that will position us well for sustainable long-term growth and expansion</li></ul>
